scripts.setup:node: npm install -g cross-var && cross-var nvm install $npm_package_engines_node && cross-var nvm use $npm_package_engines_node && npm install
scripts.populate:product: wp-env run cli -- wp wc product create --user="1" --regular_price="11.00" --name="Test Product 1"
scripts.populate:coupon: wp-env run cli -- wp wc shop_coupon create --user="1" --code="dynamic_coupon" --discount_type="repro_dynamic_cart"
scripts.populate:shop_order: wp-env run cli -- wp repro populate
